packages.name: Initial State Event Streamer
packages.description: A Hubitat App to allow Hubitat Evolution events to be viewable inside an Initial State Event Bucket in your https://www.initialstate.com account.

packages.name: Vacation Lighting Simulator - For Vacations
packages.description: An enhanced Hibitat app to simulate light and switch behaviors of an occupied home while you are away or on Vacation. Allows many customizations, summary notifications, and easy testing.
